title: Set uploaded image as NCW Adventures logo (UI + favicon)

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file (1771343232477.png) to the frontend static assets and treat it as the official NCW Adventures logo, using a stable filename/path that can be referenced across the app.

quotes: Please set this image as the logo for my NCW Adventures app.

acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the uploaded image copied into frontend/public under a stable path (not dependent on the upload filename).
The logo can be loaded by the browser via a direct /assets/... URL without going through the backend.

requirements.text: Update the UI to display the NCW Adventures logo in user-visible locations: (1) the landing page (PortalHome) near the main heading, and (2) the in-app header (GamificationHeader) so it appears on all non-landing views.

quotes: Please set this image as the logo for my NCW Adventures app.

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing screen, the logo is visible and does not overlap the existing hero content (title, subtitle, CTA).
On non-landing screens, the header shows the logo alongside the existing header controls without breaking layout on mobile.
All logo tags include English alt text (e.g., "NCW Adventures logo").

requirements.text: Set the app favicon/app icon to use the NCW Adventures logo by adding appropriate <link rel="icon"> (and related) tags in frontend/index.html that point to logo-derived icon assets in frontend/public.

quotes: Please set this image as the logo for my NCW Adventures app.

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes favicon/app icon links pointing to the logo-derived icon files.
When the app is loaded, the browser tab/favicon displays the new NCW Adventures logo (subject to browser caching).

requirements.text: Generate and include logo-derived icon image variants as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated, suitable for favicon/app icon usage, using the provided uploaded logo as the source.

quotes: Please set this image as the logo for my NCW Adventures app.

acceptanceCriteria: The icon variants listed in Image Requirements are present in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified.
The generated icons are visually centered and legible at small sizes (especially 32x32).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Do not add any backend changes; logo handling must be frontend-only static assets.
nonGoals: Deleting or removing previously published versions/releases.
Changing the app name text (it is already set to "NCW Adventures").
Adding new authentication methods or external integrations.

required: Square app icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered, optimized for high-resolution app icon use (ncw-app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Square app icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered, optimized for PWA/launcher use (ncw-app-icon.dim_192x192.png)
Favicon-sized square icon showing the provided gold NCW emblem centered and legible at small size (ncw-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
